programs.program_name: Bachelor of Science (Hons) in Accounting & Finance (3+0), University of London, UK

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level:
2 Passes with minimum of Grade D.  SPM-level or equivalent:
4 credits including English & Mathematics
entry_requirements_raw.UEC:
Grade B in 5 Subjects including Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
3 credits including English
Note: Subjects must be different or "non-overlapping" and are acceptable to the University of London.
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma:
Please contact our counsellors for further details.  SPM-level or equivalent:
4 credits including English & Mathematics
entry_requirements_raw.STPM:
2 Principal Passes with minimum of Grade C+.  SPM-level or equivalent:
4 credits including English & Mathematics
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation:
Please contact our counsellors for further details.  SPM-level or equivalent:
4 credits including English & Mathematics
entry_requirements_raw.CPU:
Please contact our counsellors for further details.  SPM-level or equivalent:
4 credits including English & Mathematics
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE:
Please contact our counsellors for further details.  SPM-level or equivalent:
4 credits including English & Mathematics

course_content.core:
1st Year 
Introduction to Economics 
Principles of Accounting
Maths 1 & Stats 1
Introduction to Finance

2nd Year
Microeconomics
Management Accounting 
Financial Reporting 
Financial Management

3rd Year
Accounting: Markets and Organisations
Auditing & Assurance
Management Science Methods 
Business & Mgt in a Global Context 1st Year 2nd Year 3rd Year

Note: Subjects must be different or "non-overlapping" and are acceptable to the University of London.

programs.program_name: Bachelor in Science (Hons) in Computer Science (3+0), University of London, UK

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level: Pass A Level with 2 D's.  Pass SPM with 5 Credits (incl B in Maths, C in English, C in one science subject + 2 other credits)
entry_requirements_raw.UEC:
5 Credits (A~B) in UEC (incl. Additional Maths).  3 Credits in SPM (incl. B in Maths, C in English + 1 other credit). 

Note: UEC & SPM Subjects must be different or "non-overlapping" and are acceptable to the University of London.
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma: MQA Accredited Diploma in Computer Science or equivalent with CGPA of 2.5.  3 Credits in SPM (incl. B in Maths)
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: Pass STPM with 2 C's.  Pass SPM with 5 Credits (incl B in Maths, C in English, C in one science subject + 2 other credits)
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation: MQA Accredited Foundation with CGPA of 2.5.  5 Credits in SPM (incl. B in Maths, C in one science subject + 3 other credits

course_content.core: 1st Year Semester 1 Introduction to Programming I Fundamentals of Computer Science Computational Mathematics How Computers Work Semester 2 Introduction to Programming II Discrete Mathematics Algorithms and Data Structures I Web Development  2nd Year Semester 1 Object-Oriented Programming Software Design and Development Programming with Data Agile Software Projects Communication Skills/Bahasa Kebangsaan Semester 2 Computer Security Graphics Programming Algorithms and Data Structures II Databases, Networks and the Web Malaysian Economy  3rd Year Semester 1 (Choose 3 from the following) Data Science Advance Web Development Physical Computing and the Internet of Things Mobile Development 3D Graphics and Animation Hubungan Etnik Tamadun Islam & Tamadun Asia Self Development Semester 2 (Choose 3 from the following) Games Development Natural Language Processing Machine Learning and Neural Networks Artificial Intelligence Final Project  4th Year Semester 1 Industrial Training

A-Level.text: Pass A Level with 2 D's.  Pass SPM with 5 Credits (incl B in Maths, C in English, C in one science subject + 2 other credits)

UEC.text:
5 Credits (A~B) in UEC (incl. Additional Maths).  3 Credits in SPM (incl. B in Maths, C in English + 1 other credit). 

Note: UEC & SPM Subjects must be different or "non-overlapping" and are acceptable to the University of London.

Diploma.text: MQA Accredited Diploma in Computer Science or equivalent with CGPA of 2.5.  3 Credits in SPM (incl. B in Maths)

STPM.text: Pass STPM with 2 C's.  Pass SPM with 5 Credits (incl B in Maths, C in English, C in one science subject + 2 other credits)

Foundation.text: MQA Accredited Foundation with CGPA of 2.5.  5 Credits in SPM (incl. B in Maths, C in one science subject + 3 other credits

programs.program_name: Bachelor of Laws (LLB) (Hons) (3+0), University of London, UK

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level:
2 Passes.  CLP Requirements apply :
UK Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level including English obtained in one examination
Australia/NZ Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level equivalent (Year 10) obtained in one examination
entry_requirements_raw.UEC:
5 Credits (A~B) in UEC.  CLP Requirements
UK Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level including English obtained in one examination
Australia/NZ Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level equivalent (Year 10) obtained in one examination
Note: UEC & SPM Subjects must be different or "non-overlapping" and are acceptable to the University of London.
entry_requirements_raw.STPM:
2 Principal Passes.  CLP Requirements apply :
UK Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level including English obtained in one examination
Australia/NZ Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level equivalent (Year 10) obtained in one examination
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE:
Please contact our counsellors for further details.  CLP Requirements apply :
UK Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level including English obtained in one examination
Australia/NZ Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level equivalent (Year 10) obtained in one examination

english_requirements.MUET: Band 4 (not required if the student is taught in English)
english_requirements.IELTS: 6.0 (not required if the student is taught in English)

course_content.core:
1st Year
Legal System & Method
Public Law 
Criminal Law 
Contract Law

2nd Year
Tort Law
Equity & Trust
Family Law
Commercial Law 

3rd Year
Jurisprudence & Legal Theory
Company Law
Equity and Trusts
Evidence 1st Year 2nd Year 3rd Year

A-Level.text:
2 Passes.  CLP Requirements apply :
UK Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level including English obtained in one examination
Australia/NZ Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level equivalent (Year 10) obtained in one examination

UEC.text:
5 Credits (A~B) in UEC.  CLP Requirements
UK Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level including English obtained in one examination
Australia/NZ Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level equivalent (Year 10) obtained in one examination
Note: UEC & SPM Subjects must be different or "non-overlapping" and are acceptable to the University of London.

STPM.text:
2 Principal Passes.  CLP Requirements apply :
UK Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level including English obtained in one examination
Australia/NZ Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level equivalent (Year 10) obtained in one examination

SACE/WACE.text:
Please contact our counsellors for further details.  CLP Requirements apply :
UK Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level including English obtained in one examination
Australia/NZ Law Degree - 5 credits in SPM/O-Level equivalent (Year 10) obtained in one examination

entry_requirements_raw.SPM: 3 credits (incl. Maths & a pass in English).
entry_requirements_raw.O-Level: 3 credits (incl. Maths & a pass in English).

course_content.core: Subjects Academic English Financial Accounting 1 3Principles of IT 4Mathematics 1 Pengajian Malaysia Intro. to Business Statistics 1 Intensive English Grammar Principles of Management Microeconomics Consumer Behaviour Financial Accounting 2 Mathematics 2 Principles of Banking Communication Skills Self-Development Malaysian Economy Business & Company Law HR Management Principles of Finance E-Business Principles of Marketing Organisational Behaviour Statistics 2 Business Communication International Business Cost & Management Accounting Entrepreneurship Development Business Ethics Macroeconomics

SPM.text: 3 credits (incl. Maths & a pass in English).

O-Level.text: 3 credits (incl. Maths & a pass in English).
